solution_line_template: So, in {hours_in_day} hours we have {minutes_per_hour} * {hours_in_day} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{hours_in_day}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.

So, the volume of air Ross inhaled in {hours_in_day} hours is: {breaths_per_minute} breaths/minute * {air_per_breath} L/breath * {total_minutes} minutes = {numerator_part} / {denominator_part} = <<{breaths_per_minute}*{air_per_breath}*{total_minutes}={total_volume_inhaled}>>{total_volume_inhaled} liters.
